title: [DI6] Senior Tester (Automation/Manual) – MSB - 1Y561
description: Mô tả công việc

Đóng vai trò quan trọng trong các dự án chuyển đổi số trọng điểm của MSB như BPM Risk - xây dựng nền tảng digital lending hợp nhất từ đầu đến cuối; Magnet - nền tảng dữ liệu 360 độ tăng cường trải nghiệm khách hàng; Risk STP - hệ thống quản trị rủi ro tự động hóa cao..và nhiều dự án khác

title: Senior QC Engineer (QA QC, Tester)
company: The Rep. Office of STYL Solutions Pte. Ltd. In HCMC
company_model: Dịch vụ và Tư vấn giải pháp
linh_vuc: Sản Phẩm Phần Mềm và Dịch Vụ Web
description: Mô tả công việc

Ride on the wave of Industry 4.0! Join STYL Solutions in the forefront of using Fintech and IoT technologies for smart city/nation transformation. Headquartered in Singapore with an R&D center in Vietnam, STYL Solutions designs, develops, and supplies hardware, software, and integrated solutions for applications in payment, loyalty management, location tracking, self-service operation, and telemetry. Our market segment coverage extends from financial services, retail, mass transit, and education to social services markets in Singapore and South Asia Pacific.

Ride on the wave of Industry 4.0! Join STYL Solutions in the forefront of using Fintech and IoT technologies for smart city/nation transformation. Headquartered in Singapore with an R&D center in Vietnam, STYL Solutions designs, develops, and supplies hardware, software, and integrated solutions for applications in payment, loyalty management, location tracking, self-service operation, and telemetry. Our market segment coverage extends from financial services, retail, mass transit, and education to social services markets in Singapore and South Asia Pacific.
Our vision is to use Fintech and IoT to create smart and efficient cities that enhance Quality of Life through convenience and healthier living.
Our vision is to use Fintech and IoT to create smart and efficient cities that enhance Quality of Life through convenience and healthier living.
We're looking for an ambitious Senior QC Engineer to join our team.
We're looking for an ambitious Senior
Senior
QC Engineer
QC Engineer
to join our team.
Your responsibilities will include, but are not limited to:
Your responsibilities will include, but are not limited to:
Your responsibilities will include, but are not limited to:

Design, develop, and execute functional test cases that ensure the software meets the intended requirements and quality standards.
The engineer shall perform the test activity: generate and send test reports to the team lead and project manager and follow up for issue verification and bug resolution.
Work with the development team to convert the requirements and design documents into a test plan containing an overview, collection of test cases, and test scenarios. 
Participate in improving test processes, and propose new ideas on how to improve customer satisfaction and the quality of products. 
Review test cases and scripts created by other team members to ensure that proper test coverage has been developed.
Collaborate with Development and DevOps teams to ensure the necessary data/builds/infrastructure are built and available and that test environments are available and functional. 
Work with the end users to guide and manage the user acceptance phase of testing.
Research and identify methodologies and tools to improve the software testing process.

Here at STYL Solutions, we encourage our employees to take initiative, propose ideas, and provide them with the opportunity to dive into multiple projects. We are looking for candidates who possess the following:

Knowledge of software development life cycle, Agile, Scrum, Kanban methodologies
Knowledge utilizing test management tools such as Jira/Testrail
Time management, prioritization, and independence as well as keen attention to detail.
Ability to work cross-functionally with internal and distributed teams.
Experience with Cross-browser and mobile testing.
Any knowledge or experience with test automation tools would be a plus!
Any knowledge or experience with load test tools (Ex: JMeter) would be a plus!
Advance English communication is a plus!

title: Tester / QA QC (Senior)
linh_vuc: Sản Phẩm Phần Mềm và Dịch Vụ Web
description: Mô tả công việc

Designer Journeys is seeking a highly motivated and talented Senior Test/QA Engineer to join our fast-growing travel tech start-up. You will have the opportunity to work with a driven and competent team towards our grand vision of disrupting the travel product supply chain by consistently and rapidly taking small steps at a time.

Designer Journeys is seeking a highly motivated and talented Senior Test/QA Engineer to join our fast-growing travel tech start-up. You will have the opportunity to work with a driven and competent team towards our grand vision of disrupting the travel product supply chain by consistently and rapidly taking small steps at a time.
Responsibilities
Responsibilities

Collaborate closely with product managers and development teams to thoroughly understand project requirements and translate them into comprehensive test plans and strategies.
Provide input on the clarity, testability, and potential risks associated with the requirements to ensure complete coverage.
Design and develop detailed, well-structured test cases based on product requirements, ensuring full coverage of both functional and non-functional aspects of the system.
Maintain clear and comprehensive documentation for all test cases, test data, and testing scenarios to facilitate reusability and consistency in testing efforts.
Perform extensive manual testing, including functional, regression, usability, and exploratory testing, to ensure a seamless user experience across both web and mobile applications.
Execute tests across multiple devices, operating systems, and browsers, ensuring consistency in application performance and functionality across platforms.
Ensure thorough testing coverage across various platforms, including web browsers and mobile operating systems (iOS and Android), to guarantee consistent functionality and performance for all users.
Log, track, and verify defects in the bug-tracking system, ensuring detailed bug reports with clear reproduction steps and screenshots where necessary.
Collaborate with developers to resolve bugs and ensure that fixes are effectively tested and verified before release.
Track and document all testing activities, providing regular reports on test progress, test execution results, risks, and key issues identified during testing.
Clearly communicate test results and identified defects to stakeholders, developers, and project teams, ensuring transparency on project quality.
Actively participate in Agile ceremonies, including daily stand-ups, sprint planning, and retrospectives, providing updates on testing progress and offering feedback on the quality of the product and overall testing efforts.
Propose and implement improvements to streamline manual testing efforts and ensure high-quality releases within project deadlines.
Contribute to the initial development and maintenance of basic automated test scripts, focusing on automating repetitive or time-consuming test cases to enhance overall test efficiency.

Job Description
Job Description

Lead testing for systems developed on Salesforce for Japanese clients
Manage a small team of testers, ensuring the smooth progress of the testing process through coordination and management
Create detailed test specifications in Japanese based on Japanese design documents
Execute unit and integration tests based on the test specifications
Responsible for test design, test planning, and managing test execution progress
Ensure smooth communication and collaboration with clients and development teams using various communication tools (email/chat/video conferencing)
Analyze test results, identify bugs, report findings, and propose fixes

Job Requirements

title: Junior/Senior QA Engineer (Tester/QA QC)
linh_vuc: Truyền Thông, Quảng Cáo và Giải Trí
description: Mô tả công việc
ABOUT US:
ABOUT US:

At OL Vietnam, we have been working with our sister company Orange Logic at empowering our Fortune 100 clients. You’ll work with a team of top developers to build flexible, scalable, and streamlined systems that will define the future of business management.

The company's flagship product is a web-based application designed to manage large-scale media libraries (photos, videos, audio files, documents...). As a direct result of 15+ years of independent R&D, Cortex is the most flexible DAM on the market and the solution chosen by Amazon, BBC, United Nations, National Geographic, WWF,…  to manage their large digital assets libraries
Orange Logic is in a fairly unique and robust financial position with no debt, we are:

Independent: we can adopt a longer term vision. 
Stable: we are less affected by economic conditions. For example, there were no layoffs or compensation cuts during the Covid economic downturn. We even kept hiring!
Independent: we can adopt a longer term vision.
Stable: we are less affected by economic conditions. For example, there were no layoffs or compensation cuts during the Covid economic downturn. We even kept hiring!
The same core group of tech driven founders is driving the strategy today, with an obsession for the product.
MISSION:
MISSION:
As a QAE, you will help to ensure that the product systematically meets and exceeds our users’ expectations.
You will contribute by designing & executing the most efficient manual testing strategy to ensure that:
90+% of defects are identified & documented before reaching the end-users
90+% of defects are identified & documented before reaching the end-users
90+% of defects are identified & documented before reaching the end-users
Exclusive of defects that can only be detected in the client environment
All features behave as they should (i.e no regression)
All features behave as they should (i.e no regression)
All features behave as they should (i.e no regression)
For all the releases supported
All new features are evaluated from an End User perspective
All new features are evaluated from an End User perspective
All new features are evaluated from an End User perspective
Understand users and create relevant testing scenarios
Proactively suggest improvements for our product and methodologies
Proactively suggest improvements for our product and methodologies
Proactively suggest improvements for our product and methodologies
Report what does not work well or is broken, even if not part of the current assignments

title: Senior QA Executive (QA QC, Tester)
description: Mô tả công việc

• Oversee all aspects of quality assurance including establishing metrics, applying industry best practices, and developing new tools and processes to ensure quality goals are met.
• Define, document, and manage the testing processes and procedures to ensure reliability and compliance with standards
• Develop testing programs that address areas such as database impacts, software scenarios, regression testing, negative testing, error or bug retests, or usability.
• Design and manage test plans, scenarios, scripts, or procedures.
• Manage and conduct all testing processes including UAT, OAT and SAT.
• Ensure that the testing environment is qualified compared to the production environment.
• Create or maintain databases of known test defects.
• Conduct historical analyses of test results.
• Monitor program performance to ensure efficient and problem-free operations.
• Identify, analyze, and document problems with program function, output, online screen, or content.
• Act as key point of contact for all QA aspects of releases, providing QA services and coordinating QA resources internally and externally.
• Lead and mentor QA team members, as well as manage outside contract testers.
• Plan test schedules or strategies in accordance with project scope or delivery dates.
• Collaborate with field staff to evaluate or diagnose problems and recommend possible solutions.
• Manage Incident Management process and communicate resolutions with stakeholders.
• Manage Release and Deploy process to ensure quality of the release on production environment.
• Manage Service Desk team including SDA as a single point contact of user to fulfill the requests.
• Collect data and provide the performance report for all related ITIL processes weekly.
• Assist the Service manager in driving Service management best-practice and ITIL process standardization.

yc: Yêu cầu công việc
1. Educational level• Bachelor’s (or above) degree in the field of computer science or information systems.
1. Educational level
2. Knowledge & Experiences
2. Knowledge & Experiences
• At least 5 years’ experience in software development and/or systems management.
• Demonstrated experience developing and executing test cases, scripts, plans and procedures to support various development methodologies.
• Familiarity with entire software development life cycle and test cycles (Unit, Regression, Functional, Systems, Stress & Scale, Smoke & Sanity).
• Understanding of multi-tier web application architecture and deployment.
• Understanding of existing QA best practices and methodologies to design, implement and automate processes.
• Having ITIL certificates or working on ITIL processes is preferred.
• Prior success using a metrics-driven approach and closed-loop feedback to improve software deliverables and improve predictability and reliability of releases.
3. Technical skills
3. Technical skills
• Ability to conduct and direct research into IT issues and products as required.
• Proven analytical, evaluative, and problem-solving abilities.
• Detailed and effective written communication skills for documenting the features tested and bugs found.
• Proven automation testing, with API and web UI with various programming languages.
• Proven performance and security testing, with detail scenarios definition and knowledge, evaluate system performance health.
4. Soft skills
4. Soft skills
• Good written and oral communication skills.
• Ability to effectively prioritize and execute tasks in a high-pressure environment.
• Detail oriented, extremely responsive, and able to prioritize many tasks.
• Self-motivated, works well independently and with others.
• Highly self-motivated and directed.

title: QA cum QA/Tester - Senior Level
linh_vuc: Sản Phẩm Phần Mềm và Dịch Vụ Web
description: Mô tả công việc
Job Description:
Job Description:

We’re looking for a Senior QC/ QA Engineer to join our team. As a Senior QC/ QA Engineer, you will be responsible for cooperation in leading the quality assurance effort for our products. You will be working closely with our development team to ensure that our products meet the highest quality standards. If you are a detail-oriented problem solver with a passion for quality, we want to hear from you!
Responsibilities:
Responsibilities:

- Testing existing system processes and provide recommendations changes or improvements to existing processes, methods, and technologies that improve product quality, productivity, and customer satisfaction
- The candidate should be able to work independently to identify test cases/test scripts from requirements and map test cases/scripts back to the original requirement
- Understand business objectives and build alignment and buy-in cross-functionally.
- Analyze functional and technical requirements and translate them into manual and/or automatable scenarios.
- Developing and Executing the Cross Browser (browsers like Safari, Chrome, Mobile browsers) testing.
- Perform exploratory testing with a focus on identifying and documenting defects
- Review defects and test logs with QC/QA team to identify root causes and suggest solutions for improving testing, documentation, and process improvement
- Understand product lifecycle concepts and participate in the test planning process
- Provide training to junior engineers
- Join to develop quality assurance standards and processes
yc: Yêu cầu công việc
- Bachelor’s degree in engineering or related field
- 5+ years’ proven experience as QC/ QA Engineer in a fast-paced environment
- 5+ years experienced in design test case/ test scenarios and exceptional ability with cross-browser, cross-platform and responsive testing (PC, mobile and tablet)
- Fluent in speaking and written English
- Hands on with various types of testing such as system, functional and regression with web and mobile testing
- Good ability to review testing results with QA /QC team member and ensure quality product as expect
- Highly collaborative internal QC/QA team member with production team who fosters open communication and facilitates mutual understanding and cooperation between all stakeholders
- Demonstrated competence and ability to be self-motivated when analyzing problems
- Be active at work, withstand high pressure
- Ability to develop maintainable test automation solutions using Selenium, Appium or similar technologies.
- Demonstrated knowledge of testing one or more of the following: API interfaces, databases/data stores, analytics
- Experience in Stress testing or performance testing.
address: Shophouse Sarina 1C, Sala, An Loi Dong Ward, Thu Duc City, Ho Chi Minh

linh_vuc: Dịch Vụ và Tư Vấn IT
description: Mô tả công việc
· Design and develop test automation scripts and automation frameworks
· Write, run, maintain automation test cases and create test reports
· Research issues in software through testing
· Collaborate with Business Analysts and Software Developers to develop solutions
· Review the testability of the test basis (specifications, requirements, etc.)
· Perform all levels of testing as applicable to the project
· Keep updated with the latest industry developments.
yc: Yêu cầu công việc
What we are looking for:
What we are looking for:
What we are looking for:
· Bachelor Degree in Computer Science or related degree
· Good communication in French is a must (at least B1 level)
· Mathematical aptitude and strong problem-solving skills
· Solid knowledge of testing life cycle, testing terminologies, testing processes and tools.
· Team-player with experience working with international and multi-functional teams
· Self-development skills to keep up to date with fast-changing trends
· Ability to work under high pressure and tight schedule, highly accurate and detail-oriented
· Demonstrable experience in working with Agile/Scrum setup
· Knowledge of the business domains: Insurance (Life/Non-life) is a plus
· Good communication in English is a plus
· Experience with performance and/or security testing is a plus
Technical Skills
Technical Skills
· Language: Any object oriented programming language like Java/Python/C#
· Tools: Maven, GIT, Soap UI/Postman, Appium, Azure DevOps, JIRA, Confluence, Any performance test tool (Jmeter/LoadRunner).
· Testing Frameworks: BDD framework with Selenium WebDriver, RestAssured API, ReadyAPI, Cucumber/Jbehave ,TestNG.
· CI/CD: Jenkins, TeamCity
